{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Senior Flutter Developer",
  "description": "Venus67 Foundation is a member-driven organization that prioritizes collective actions to achieve common goals, with a focus on financial and health empowerment for women.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Flutter Developer
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos

Job Summary


	We are looking to hire a senior Flutter developer with 5+ years of experience to create cross-platform fintech and edtech apps.
	This is a hybrid role in Lagos, Nigeria.


Responsibilities


	Design and build advanced applications for the mobile platform using Flutter framework.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features in a dynamic work environment.
	Work on bug fixing and improving application performance, ensuring code quality and maintainability.
	Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.
	Integrate user interfaces with APIs and data sources, adhering to best practices in UI/UX design.


Qualifications


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field, or equivalent experience.
	Proven experience as a Flutter Developer, with a portfolio showcasing successfully launched mobile applications on both iOS and Android.
	Proficiency in the Dart programming language and a deep understanding of the Flutter framework for cross-platform mobile development.
	Familiarity with RESTful APIs and web sockets, enabling smooth integration between mobile applications and backend services.
	In-depth knowledge of mobile UI/UX guidelines, responsive design principles, and the ability to create visually compelling user interfaces.
	Solid understanding of state management solutions such as Provider, Riverpod, or Bloc, to ensure efficient and maintainable code.
	Strong understanding of UI design principles, patterns, and best practices.
	Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect Flutter applications to back-end services.
	Understanding of progressive web apps (PWAs), Firebase, and Azure DevOps.
	Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning. Knowledge of cloud message APIs and push notifications.
	Experience with version control systems like Git, essential for code management and collaborative development.


Skills:


	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, critical for troubleshooting and performance optimization in Flutter apps.
	Ability to work independently as well as in a team-oriented, agile environment, demonstrating excellent time management skills.
	Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, crucial for effective collaboration with team members, designers, and stakeholders.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Application to:&nbsp;careers@venus67.com&nbsp;using &quot;Senior Flutter Developer Application - [Your Name]&quot; as the subject of the email.

Send your application with:


	CV/Resume
	GitHub link (or portfolio showcasing Flutter projects)
	Cover letter explaining why you&rsquo;re a great fit.
",
  "datePosted": "2025-12-05",
  "validThrough": "2026-01-01",

    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Venus67 Foundation"
    
  },

Senior Flutter Developer Job at Venus67 Foundation




        
    

        
        Venus67 Foundation is a member-driven organization that prioritizes collective actions to achieve common goals, with a focus on financial and health empowerment for women.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Flutter Developer
Job Location: Lagos

Job Summary


	We are looking to hire a senior Flutter developer with 5+ years of experience to create cross-platform fintech and edtech apps.
	This is a hybrid role in Lagos, Nigeria.


Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Design and build advanced applications for the mobile platform using Flutter framework.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features in a dynamic work environment.
	Work on bug fixing and improving application performance, ensuring code quality and maintainability.
	Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.
	Integrate user interfaces with APIs and data sources, adhering to best practices in UI/UX design.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field, or equivalent experience.
	Proven experience as a Flutter Developer, with a portfolio showcasing successfully launched mobile applications on both iOS and Android.
	Proficiency in the Dart programming language and a deep understanding of the Flutter framework for cross-platform mobile development.
	Familiarity with RESTful APIs and web sockets, enabling smooth integration between mobile applications and backend services.
	In-depth knowledge of mobile UI/UX guidelines, responsive design principles, and the ability to create visually compelling user interfaces.
	Solid understanding of state management solutions such as Provider, Riverpod, or Bloc, to ensure efficient and maintainable code.
	Strong understanding of UI design principles, patterns, and best practices.
	Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect Flutter applications to back-end services.
	Understanding of progressive web apps (PWAs), Firebase, and Azure DevOps.
	Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning. Knowledge of cloud message APIs and push notifications.
	Experience with version control systems like Git, essential for code management and collaborative development.


Skills:


	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, critical for troubleshooting and performance optimization in Flutter apps.
	Ability to work independently as well as in a team-oriented, agile environment, demonstrating excellent time management skills.
	Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, crucial for effective collaboration with team members, designers, and stakeholders.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Application to: careers@venus67.com using "Senior Flutter Developer Application - [Your Name]" as the subject of the email.

Send your application with:


	CV/Resume
	GitHub link (or portfolio showcasing Flutter projects)
	Cover letter explaining why you’re a great fit.
    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Pharmacist",
  "description": "Mebik Pharmacy is a leading pharmaceutical organization committed to quality healthcare services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Pharmacist

Job Location:&nbsp;Gbagada, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We seek a motivated Pharmacist with 0-2 years of experience to join our team in Gbagada, Lagos, contributing to excellent patient care and pharmacy operations.


Key Responsibilities


	Medication Management: Dispense medications accurately with appropriate patient counseling on use, dosage, and interactions.
	Patient Counseling: Provide advice on medication adherence, lifestyle adjustments for health optimization.
	Inventory Control: Assist in managing pharmaceutical stock levels, monitoring expiry dates.
	Regulatory Compliance: Ensure adherence to Nigerian pharmacy laws and guidelines (e.g., PCN regulations).
	Clinical Support: Engage with healthcare professionals for queries on medications/therapeutics.
	Pharmacy Operations: Support daily pharmacy activities, including record-keeping.
	Health Promotion: Participate in health awareness initiatives aligned with Mebik Pharmacy&rsquo;s goals.
	Documentation: Maintain accurate patient and medication records as required.
	Collaboration: Work with the pharmacy team for efficient service delivery.
	Continuous Learning: Keep abreast of developments in pharmacy practice/pharmaceuticals.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a B.Sc Degree in Pharmacy with 0-2 years of experience (entry-level and early career opportunities)


Salary


	N270,000 - N300,000 / Month.


What We Offers:


	Professional growth opportunities in a dynamic setting.
	Collaborative healthcare environment.
	Contribution to community health outcomes.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their detailed CV to:&nbsp;pharmacymebikhr@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note:&nbsp;For more information, WhatsApp: 08085129453.",

Pharmacist Job at Mebik Pharmacy




        
    

        
        Mebik Pharmacy is a leading pharmaceutical organization committed to quality healthcare services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Pharmacist

Job Location: Gbagada, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We seek a motivated Pharmacist with 0-2 years of experience to join our team in Gbagada, Lagos, contributing to excellent patient care and pharmacy operations.


Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Medication Management: Dispense medications accurately with appropriate patient counseling on use, dosage, and interactions.
	Patient Counseling: Provide advice on medication adherence, lifestyle adjustments for health optimization.
	Inventory Control: Assist in managing pharmaceutical stock levels, monitoring expiry dates.
	Regulatory Compliance: Ensure adherence to Nigerian pharmacy laws and guidelines (e.g., PCN regulations).
	Clinical Support: Engage with healthcare professionals for queries on medications/therapeutics.
	Pharmacy Operations: Support daily pharmacy activities, including record-keeping.
	Health Promotion: Participate in health awareness initiatives aligned with Mebik Pharmacy’s goals.
	Documentation: Maintain accurate patient and medication records as required.
	Collaboration: Work with the pharmacy team for efficient service delivery.
	Continuous Learning: Keep abreast of developments in pharmacy practice/pharmaceuticals.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a B.Sc Degree in Pharmacy with 0-2 years of experience (entry-level and early career opportunities)


Salary


	N270,000 - N300,000 / Month.


What We Offers:


	Professional growth opportunities in a dynamic setting.
	Collaborative healthcare environment.
	Contribution to community health outcomes.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their detailed CV to: pharmacymebikhr@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: For more information, WhatsApp: 08085129453.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Drilling Engineering Supervisor",
  "description": "Ellasot Consulting is an organizational development and Human Resource Management advisory firm that provides expert advice and support to organizations to improve workforce performance and align strategies with objectives.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Drilling Engineering Supervisor

Job Location:&nbsp;Trans Amadi, Port Harcourt - Rivers
Employment Type:&nbsp;Full-time
Business: Oil &amp; Gas

Job Purpose


	To lead and manage drilling engineering activities to ensure wells are designed and executed safely, efficiently, and cost-effectively in line with company standards, regulatory requirements, and industry best practices.


Key Responsibilities


	Provide technical leadership for drilling operations and well delivery strategy.
	Supervise and mentor drilling engineers and field personnel.
	Develop and approve drilling programs, casing designs, and well architectures.
	Monitor daily operations, analyze performance, and resolve drilling challenges.
	Control operational cost and optimize drilling performance (ROP, NPT).
	Oversee contractor performance and service quality.
	Support contract management and procurement decisions.
	Monitor daily drilling performance and ensure adherence to drilling program.
	Ensure drilling programs comply with HSE regulations, industry standards, and well control guidelines (IWCF/IADC).


Qualifications &amp; Experience


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Petroleum Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, or related discipline.
	18+ yearsof experience in drilling, completions, or well engineering.
	Valid IWCF/IADC Well Control Certification (supervisor level preferred).
	Strong knowledge of well control, drilling fluids, directional drilling, casing design, and rig operations.
	Proficiency with drilling software (Landmark, WellPlan, Compass, StressCheck, etc.).
	Experience with bothonshore and offshorewells is an advantage.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;frontdeskellasot@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

Drilling Engineering Supervisor Job at Ellasot Consulting




        
    

        
        Ellasot Consulting is an organizational development and Human Resource Management advisory firm that provides expert advice and support to organizations to improve workforce performance and align strategies with objectives.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Drilling Engineering Supervisor

Job Location: Trans Amadi, Port Harcourt - Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time
Business: Oil & Gas

Job Purpose
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	To lead and manage drilling engineering activities to ensure wells are designed and executed safely, efficiently, and cost-effectively in line with company standards, regulatory requirements, and industry best practices.


Key Responsibilities


	Provide technical leadership for drilling operations and well delivery strategy.
	Supervise and mentor drilling engineers and field personnel.
	Develop and approve drilling programs, casing designs, and well architectures.
	Monitor daily operations, analyze performance, and resolve drilling challenges.
	Control operational cost and optimize drilling performance (ROP, NPT).
	Oversee contractor performance and service quality.
	Support contract management and procurement decisions.
	Monitor daily drilling performance and ensure adherence to drilling program.
	Ensure drilling programs comply with HSE regulations, industry standards, and well control guidelines (IWCF/IADC).


Qualifications & Experience


	Bachelor’s degree in Petroleum Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, or related discipline.
	18+ yearsof experience in drilling, completions, or well engineering.
	Valid IWCF/IADC Well Control Certification (supervisor level preferred).
	Strong knowledge of well control, drilling fluids, directional drilling, casing design, and rig operations.
	Proficiency with drilling software (Landmark, WellPlan, Compass, StressCheck, etc.).
	Experience with bothonshore and offshorewells is an advantage.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: frontdeskellasot@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Blockchain Developer",
  "description": "Venus67 Foundation is a non-profit organisation dedicated to providing vocational training, digital education, and supportive world for women, youth, and children.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Blockchain Developer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos

Description


	Venus67 Foundation is a member-driven organization that prioritizes collective actions to achieve common goals, with a focus on financial and health empowerment for women.
	We are looking to hire a blockchain developer with 3+ years of experience, who will be responsible for designing, implementing, and supporting a distributed blockchain-based network.
	This is a hybrid role in Lagos, Nigeria.


Responsibilities


	Research, design, develop, and test blockchain technologies
	Brainstorm and help evaluate applications for new tools and technologies as they continually evolve
	Maintain and extend current client- and server-side applications responsible for integration and business logic
	Be involved in the global blockchain community&mdash;work on implementing and integrating the latest improvement proposals
	Document new solutions as well as maintaining that of existing ones.


Qualifications


	Bachelor&#39;s Degree in Information Security, Computer Science, or related fields.
	At least 3 years of experience as a blockchain developer.
	Advanced proficiency in programming languages, such as C++, Java, and Python.
	Extensive experience in back-end development, algorithms, and data structures.
	Knowledge of cryptography and blockchain protocols.
	Familiarity with different ways to deploy smart contracts, such as Remix, Truffle suite, and Hardhat
	In-depth knowledge of best practices in blockchain management and data protection.


Skills:


	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, critical for troubleshooting and performance optimization.
	Ability to work independently as well as in a team-oriented, agile environment, demonstrating excellent time management skills.
	Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, crucial for effective collaboration with team members, designers, and stakeholders.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV / Resume, GitHub / link to blockchain projects, Cover letter highlighting blockchain skills / experience to:&nbsp;careers@venus67.com&nbsp;using &quot;Blockchain Developer Application - [Your Name]&quot; as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2026-01-06",

  },

      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }

Blockchain Developer Job at Venus67 Foundation




        
    

        
        Venus67 Foundation is a non-profit organisation dedicated to providing vocational training, digital education, and supportive world for women, youth, and children.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Blockchain Developer

Job Location: Lagos

Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Venus67 Foundation is a member-driven organization that prioritizes collective actions to achieve common goals, with a focus on financial and health empowerment for women.
	We are looking to hire a blockchain developer with 3+ years of experience, who will be responsible for designing, implementing, and supporting a distributed blockchain-based network.
	This is a hybrid role in Lagos, Nigeria.


Responsibilities


	Research, design, develop, and test blockchain technologies
	Brainstorm and help evaluate applications for new tools and technologies as they continually evolve
	Maintain and extend current client- and server-side applications responsible for integration and business logic
	Be involved in the global blockchain community—work on implementing and integrating the latest improvement proposals
	Document new solutions as well as maintaining that of existing ones.


Qualifications


	Bachelor's Degree in Information Security, Computer Science, or related fields.
	At least 3 years of experience as a blockchain developer.
	Advanced proficiency in programming languages, such as C++, Java, and Python.
	Extensive experience in back-end development, algorithms, and data structures.
	Knowledge of cryptography and blockchain protocols.
	Familiarity with different ways to deploy smart contracts, such as Remix, Truffle suite, and Hardhat
	In-depth knowledge of best practices in blockchain management and data protection.


Skills:


	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, critical for troubleshooting and performance optimization.
	Ability to work independently as well as in a team-oriented, agile environment, demonstrating excellent time management skills.
	Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, crucial for effective collaboration with team members, designers, and stakeholders.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV / Resume, GitHub / link to blockchain projects, Cover letter highlighting blockchain skills / experience to: careers@venus67.com using "Blockchain Developer Application - [Your Name]" as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Admin Officer / Social Media Manager",
  "description": "HR-EX Consulting is a consulting firm. We offer professional HR services to small business, functioning as an outsourced HR department. Our core principle is to provide professional HR services at affordable rates to business at the fraction of the cost of hiring a full time HR staff.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Admin Officer / Social Media Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Admin Officer / Social Media Manager will serve as the first point of contact for visitors and clients, ensuring a warm, professional, and efficient reception experience.
	The role will also provide administrative support to the Executive Assistant to the MD/Admin Manager, relieve the EA in her absence, manage office supplies and work tools, and create engaging social media content to enhance the company&rsquo;s online presence.
	The ideal candidate must be versatile, well-spoken, organized, and creative, with a strong background in administration and communication.


Key Responsibilities


	Receive and welcome visitors, clients, and vendors in a professional and courteous manner.
	Maintain a clean, organized, and presentable reception area at all times.
	Manage incoming calls, emails, and correspondence, ensuring prompt redirection or follow-up.
	Keep accurate records of visitor logs and deliveries.
	Provide comprehensive administrative support to the EA to the MD and Admin Manager.
	Relieve the EA in her absence by helping coordinate the MD&rsquo;s calendar, meetings, appointments, and travel arrangements.
	Prepare and organize documents, reports, memos, and presentations as required.
	Assist in organizing company events, meetings, and internal activities.
	Support general office operations including filing, photocopying, scheduling, and documentation.
	Monitor and maintain inventory of office supplies, stationery, and work tools.
	Liaise with vendors and service providers to ensure timely supply and maintenance of office equipment.
	Ensure proper functionality of front-desk work tools and escalate issues promptly.
	Support facility-related tasks such as coordinating repairs and ensuring the office environment remains conducive.
	Create, schedule, and manage content across the company&rsquo;s social media platforms.
	Develop engaging posts, captions, and campaigns aligned with the brand&rsquo;s tone and direction.
	Monitor online engagement, respond to inquiries, and track performance metrics.
	Suggest ideas for improving brand visibility and online reputation.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Mass Communication, Public Relations, Business Administration, or a related field.
	3 - 5 years of proven experience in front desk administration, office management, or a similar role.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
	Proficiency in MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
	Experience managing social media accounts across platforms (Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, etc.).
	Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities.
	High level of professionalism, discretion, and attention to detail.
	Creative mindset with basic content creation skills (graphics, captions, short videos).


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs to:&nbsp;recruitment@hrexng.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the Subject of the mail.

Note: Only qualified candidates will be contacted.",

  "validThrough": "2026-01-06",

  },

Admin Officer / Social Media Manager Job at HR-EX Consulting




        
    

        
        HR-EX Consulting is a consulting firm. We offer professional HR services to small business, functioning as an outsourced HR department. Our core principle is to provide professional HR services at affordable rates to business at the fraction of the cost of hiring a full time HR staff.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Admin Officer / Social Media Manager

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Admin Officer / Social Media Manager will serve as the first point of contact for visitors and clients, ensuring a warm, professional, and efficient reception experience.
	The role will also provide administrative support to the Executive Assistant to the MD/Admin Manager, relieve the EA in her absence, manage office supplies and work tools, and create engaging social media content to enhance the company’s online presence.
	The ideal candidate must be versatile, well-spoken, organized, and creative, with a strong background in administration and communication.


Key Responsibilities


	Receive and welcome visitors, clients, and vendors in a professional and courteous manner.
	Maintain a clean, organized, and presentable reception area at all times.
	Manage incoming calls, emails, and correspondence, ensuring prompt redirection or follow-up.
	Keep accurate records of visitor logs and deliveries.
	Provide comprehensive administrative support to the EA to the MD and Admin Manager.
	Relieve the EA in her absence by helping coordinate the MD’s calendar, meetings, appointments, and travel arrangements.
	Prepare and organize documents, reports, memos, and presentations as required.
	Assist in organizing company events, meetings, and internal activities.
	Support general office operations including filing, photocopying, scheduling, and documentation.
	Monitor and maintain inventory of office supplies, stationery, and work tools.
	Liaise with vendors and service providers to ensure timely supply and maintenance of office equipment.
	Ensure proper functionality of front-desk work tools and escalate issues promptly.
	Support facility-related tasks such as coordinating repairs and ensuring the office environment remains conducive.
	Create, schedule, and manage content across the company’s social media platforms.
	Develop engaging posts, captions, and campaigns aligned with the brand’s tone and direction.
	Monitor online engagement, respond to inquiries, and track performance metrics.
	Suggest ideas for improving brand visibility and online reputation.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Mass Communication, Public Relations, Business Administration, or a related field.
	3 - 5 years of proven experience in front desk administration, office management, or a similar role.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
	Proficiency in MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
	Experience managing social media accounts across platforms (Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, etc.).
	Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities.
	High level of professionalism, discretion, and attention to detail.
	Creative mindset with basic content creation skills (graphics, captions, short videos).


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs to: recruitment@hrexng.com using the Job Position as the Subject of the mail.

Note: Only qualified candidates will be contacted.
